public class Forward extends Player

      public Forward(String name, String surname, int side, int shooting, int dribbling, int passing, int defending, int aggression, int goalkeeping, int team_number, StatsTeam stats, int mentality, int motivation)
      Constructor of class Forward with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the player
      surname - surname of the player
      side - the side of the player; left(1), center(2) or right(3)
      shooting - the shooting ability of the player
      dribbling - the dribbling ability of the player
      passing - the passing ability of the player
      defending - the defending ability of the player
      aggression - the aggression of the player
      goalkeeping - the goalkeeping ability of the player
      team_number - the number of the team player belongs to
      stats - the stats of the team player belongs to
      mentality - the mentality of the player
      motivation - the motivation of the player

  • Method Details

    • decision_ball

      public int decision_ball(Pitch pitch, Ball ball, Team team, int event, double con, int rain)
      Method decision_ball of forward. Forward can perform actions: - passing - dribbling - shooting - free kick - penalty His choice depends on: - event which occurred - place - stamina - mentality
      Specified by:
      decision_ball in class Player
      Parameters:
      pitch - the pitch of the game
      ball - the ball
      team - the team of the player who makes a decision
      event - the event
      con - the condition modifier
      rain - the rain modifier
      Returns:
      new event which will happen

    • player_moving

      public void player_moving(Pitch pitch, int ball_X, int ball_Y, int ball_team, double con)
      Method player_moving for forward. Moving in X-coordinates is common for defenders, midfielders, forwards. Moving in Y-coordinates is specific for other positions. It depends on player's current place, ball place, and what team possesses the ball.
      Overrides:
      player_moving in class Player
      Parameters:
      pitch - the pitch of the game
      ball_X - ball X-coordinate
      ball_Y - ball Y-coordinate
      ball_team - team which owns the ball
      con - condition modifier
